ItemType.name: A-class defender
ItemType.description: Though obsoleted by EI's series of deflectors, these shield generators are cheap and effective for small ships.

ItemType.name: class I deflector
ItemType.description: The basic entry in Earth Industries' series of popular shield generators.

ItemType.name: Cyclotron S10 deflector
ItemType.description: NAMI's Cyclotron deflectors absorb a lot of damage, but take more time to regenerate.

ItemType.name: laser deflector
ItemType.description: Better than a class I at deflecting laser energy; worse at deflecting anything else.

ItemType.name: class II deflector
ItemType.description: Though not powerful enough for military-grade weapons, the class II provides adequate defense for freelancers and independent merchantships.

ItemType.name: hull plate ionizer
ItemType.description: This device ionizes a ship's hull, repelling kinetic and blast damage. The ionization field weakens as the ship's armor is damaged.

ItemType.name: Cyclotron S55 deflector
ItemType.description: Stronger than a class III deflector using less than half the power.

ItemType.name: monopole deflector screen
ItemType.description: A quantum magnetic field strongly deflects damage from kinetic and blast weapons. It is less effective against laser and particle beam attacks.

ItemType.name: Solon shield generator
ItemType.description: Developed by the innovative Solon Industries, this shield absorbs most laser energy. A ship with Solon shields cannot fire any laser weapons.

ItemType.name: Ceratops 1T quasi-armor
ItemType.description: This quasi-matter generator protects a starship against blast energy.

ItemType.name: class III deflector
ItemType.description: Though based on a very old design, this powerful deflector is still being manufactured by Earth Industries.

ItemType.name: Cyclotron S1200 deflector
ItemType.description: The most powerful shield generator in NAMI's Cyclotron series.

ItemType.name: :an R1 deflector
ItemType.description: The R1 deflector was developed a few decades ago to protect Fleet ships against the powerful lightning cannons of the Ares Orthodoxy.

ItemType.name: Nephren P25 shield generator
ItemType.description: Each model of the Nephren series is tuned for a different kind of damage. The P25 is designed to defend against particle and ion damage.

ItemType.name: superconducting shield generator
ItemType.description: This generator uses an array of superconducting coils. Individual coils must be replaced to restore the field after damage is taken.

ItemType.name: superconducting coil
ItemType.description: This is a special type of coil used to repair superconducting shield generators.
ItemType.Invoke:
(block ( (shieldItem (@ (objGetItems gSource "sI") 0)) (maxCharges (objGetItemProperty gSource shieldItem 'maxCharges)) (charges (objGetItemProperty gSource shieldItem 'charges)) ) (switch ; Does the ship have a superconducting shield? If not ; then we can't do anything. (!= (itmGetType shieldItem) &itSuperconductingShields;) (objSendMessage gSource Nil (typTranslate gType 'msgSSRequired))
; Are the shields fully charged? If they are, then this ; won't do anything. (geq charges maxCharges) (objSendMessage gSource Nil (typTranslate gType 'msgSSFull))
; Charge the shields (block Nil (objSetItemProperty gSource shieldItem 'incCharges (random 40 60)) (objRemoveItem gSource gItem 1) (objSendMessage gSource Nil (typTranslate gType 'msgSSRecharged)) ) ) )

ItemType.name: Yoroi S100 shield generator
ItemType.description: This is the entry-level generator in Bushido Corporation's Yoroi line.

ItemType.name: Ceratops 5T quasi-armor
ItemType.description: This is a larger and more powerful version of the quasi-matter deflector.

ItemType.name: Invincible-class deflector
ItemType.description: The Invincible-class deflector is extremely powerful. Its one flaw is that it disables all other ship systems when it collapses.

Events.OnShieldDown: (block Nil (objMakeParalyzed gSource (random 30 150)) (objSendMessage gSource Nil "Shield power surge!") )

ItemType.name: Mammoth 25MW deflector
ItemType.description: Mammoth deflector shields can absorb immense amounts of damage, but their regeneration rate is lower than competitors.

ItemType.name: mark I Omsk deflector
ItemType.attributes: commonwealth, majorItem, specialty, makayev, omskDeflector, omskDS
ItemType.description: When used in concert with Omsk armor segments, this deflector increases in strength up to 200 hit points.

Events.GetMaxHP:
(block (bonusHP) ; Enumerate the number of Omsk armor segments installed (setq bonusHP 0) (enum (objGetItems gSource "aI +OmskArmor;") theArmor (if (geq (objGetArmorLevel gSource theArmor) 25) (setq bonusHP (add bonusHP (itmGetStaticData theArmor "bonusHP"))) ) )
; We add up to a maximum of 120 hit points (add aMaxHP (min 120 bonusHP)) )

ItemType.name: :an R5 deflector
ItemType.description: This is an updated version of the R1 deflector, designed to resist the Ares Orthodoxy's lightning cannons.

ItemType.name: Yoroi S500 shield generator
ItemType.description: The Yoroi S500 is the most powerful shield generator available for non-military customers of the Bushido Corporation.

ItemType.name: Mammoth 50MW deflector
ItemType.description: The 50MW Mammoth deflector is designed for military ships. Like other Mammoth designs, it has high hit points and a low regeneration rate.

ItemType.name: Nephren B700 shield generator
ItemType.description: Each model of the Nephren series is tuned for a different kind of damage. The B700 is designed to defend against blast and thermonuclear damage.

ItemType.name: Trenton field generator
ItemType.description: Trenton shields regenerate much faster than others, but at the cost of allowing some damage to leak through.

ItemType.name: Yoroi MX shield generator
ItemType.description: This is the military version of the S500 shield generator created by the Bushido Corporation.

ItemType.name: ion reflector
ItemType.description: This shield generator reflects all ion energy.

ItemType.name: Mammoth 100MW deflector
ItemType.description: This is the most powerful deflector in the Mammoth series.

ItemType.name: mark II Omsk deflector
ItemType.attributes: commonwealth, majorItem, makayev, military, omskDeflector, omskDS, specialty
ItemType.description: When used in concert with Omsk armor segments, this deflector increases in strength up to 400 hit points.

Events.GetMaxHP:
(block (bonusHP) ; Enumerate the number of Omsk armor segments installed (setq bonusHP 0) (enum (objGetItems gSource "aI +OmskArmor;") theArmor (if (geq (objGetArmorLevel gSource theArmor) 25) (setq bonusHP (add bonusHP (itmGetStaticData theArmor "bonusHP"))) ) )
; We add up to a maximum of 260 hit points (add aMaxHP (min 260 bonusHP)) )

ItemType.name: plasma shield generator
ItemType.description: Plasma shield generators are used on most military ships. Plasma shield generators cannot be used on civilian ships without a special military ID.

ItemType.name: R9 deflector
ItemType.description: The most powerful version of the R-series deflectors is used on Commonwealth Fleet capital ships.

ItemType.name: Taikon-10 deflector
ItemType.description: The Taikon-10 deflector is optimized to defend against thermonuclear attacks.

ItemType.name: Jotun deflector
ItemType.description: This alien shield generator has controls to adjust its strength.
ItemType.Invoke:
(block (charges chargesDelta newStrength maxCharges) (setq charges (itmGetCharges gItem)) (setq maxCharges 3)
(if (ls charges maxCharges) (setq chargesDelta 1) (setq chargesDelta (subtract 0 maxCharges)) )
(shpRechargeItem gSource gItem chargesDelta) (objSendMessage gSource Nil (cat "Deflector strength at level " (add (add charges chargesDelta) 1))) )

ItemType.name: Nephren X1 shield generator
ItemType.description: The Nephren X1 is an experimental model that defends against ion and positron damage.

ItemType.name: Lazarus shield generator
ItemType.description: The Lazarus is an experimental shield generator. It has a phenomenal generation rate, but it consumes almost prohibitive amounts of power.

ItemType.name: Taikon-200 deflector
ItemType.description: The Taikon-200 deflector is optimized to defend against thermonuclear attacks.
